scripts.test: export LOGGY_STACKS=true && brunch build --env test && standard && cd public_test && npm install && xvfb-run polymer test --skip-plugin sauce
scripts.start: export LOGGY_STACKS=true && brunch watch --server & polymer serve public
scripts.start-c9: export LOGGY_STACKS=true && brunch watch --server & polymer serve public -p $PORT -H $IP
scripts.polymer-build: rm -r build && cd temp_build && polymer build && mv build ../build
scripts.build: export LOGGY_STACKS=true && brunch build --production && npm run polymer-build
